trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown under the following circumstances: an operation is performed on a durable service instance that has been marked for completion, or a persistence provider created by a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.SqlPersistenceProviderFactory"></xref> attempts to lock, unlock, or otherwise process state data that is not found in the database.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified identifier.
The unique identifier associated with this instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified identifier and inner exception.
The unique identifier associated with this instance.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified identifier and message.
The unique identifier associated with this instance.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class with the serialized data.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified message and inner exception.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref> class using the specified identifier, message and inner exception.
The unique identifier associated with this instance.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that caused the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException"></xref>.

Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception, including the exception <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.InstanceNotFoundException.InstanceId"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Gets the unique identifier associated with this instance.
A <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> that contains the unique identifier of the exception instance.
